ComicInfo.Summary: Mark Farely IS CreeD. A child who brought to life the fantastical landscapes of his mind, is now a teen and coming to realize just how those world's came to be in the first place. At a new school, he meets Lori, a gorgeous teen who can also travel to a Dreamworld. When Mark attempts to rescue her from the atrocities of her world, it proves harder than anything he's confronted before For festering within is a secret to his past. One of unspeakable terror.
